name: CAN THO, Cai Rang Floating market - Day Trip
description: Can Tho is knew as the capital city of Mekong Delta. It is noted for its floating market, village of rice paper and noodle-making, and picturesque rural canals. Before, you have to spend at least 2 days 1 night to be seen the unique beauties of Can Tho as floating market, fruit orchard, rural canals....But today, with 1 day only you will see more than such things by joining a special day trip with KIM TRAN Travel. Don't worry about your limited time - let's come with us to have a fit program....
